lead_paragraph: There are those who say the Packers — a young team led by an old quarterback — have been winning with mirrors. That may be the only thing they have not tried this season. They beat Philadelphia on a last-second field goal. They beat Denver on an 82-yard pass in overtime. They beat Minnesota last week with their first shutout in five years.
